vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Specific Use Permit for an alcoholic beverage establishment use limited to a microbrewery, microdistillery, or winery on property zoned Subarea 4 (North Tract) within Planned Development District No. 316, the Jefferson Area Special Purpose District, on the south line of Sunset Avenue, between South Bishop Avenue and South Madison Avenue
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval for a two-year period, subject to site plan and conditions
Z190-120(CT)
